content: this is a pattern for a toy amigurumi cow the pattern is called colourful cow because it was designed to be made with whatever colour combinations you want this pattern was made with 10-ply acrylic yarn and a 4 0mm crochet hook however you may use whatever ply hook size and yarn type you would like there are three different colours involved in this pattern unless you are sizing up this pattern one skein per colour is plenty and lastly if you choose to use this pattern thank you so much i enjoyed making and writing the pattern and so i hope you enjoy it too -ella
